entry.title: A Lovestruck Blogger, a Businessman, a 1-Year-Old Girl: Tales of China Eastern Flight Victims
entry.content: Almost two weeks after the Flight 5735 fell out of the sky, killing all 132 passengers and crew in one of China’s worst air disaster in decades, a clearer picture of those on board is emerging.

entry.title: Ukraine Strikes Inside Russian Territory, Russians Say
entry.content: Ukrainian attack helicopters executed a predawn raid on Russian territory, a Russian official said, eluding air defenses to strike an oil depot near the border and signaling Kyiv’s ability to broaden the field of the war.
